revised_title: Numerical Solutions for Transonic Flow and Critical Points
tldr: The author presents numerical solutions for transonic flow using a family of exact solutions for steady two-dimensional flow of a compressible fluid past a cylinder. The study focuses on the critical points where the curvature of the surface is infinite, and the flow becomes unstable. The author also discusses the application of the hodograph method to obtain new solutions and the numerical work involved in evaluating slowly convergent series.
